name: launch
signature: <RIn, E, ROut>(self: Layer<ROut, E, RIn>) => Effect<never, E, RIn>
description:
Builds this layer and uses it until it is interrupted. This is useful when
your entire application is a layer, such as an HTTP server.
documentation:
